trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload photos.

trans-unit.source: Clear your entire browsing session history, passwords, cookies anytime with a single tap.

Text for the share menu option when a user wants to add the site to Shortcuts
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open the find in page menu

Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open a page in Firefox but doesn’t have it installed. This string will not wrap in the interface. Instead, it will truncate. To prevent this, please keep the localized string to 18 or fewer characters. If your string runs longer than 18 characters, you can use 'Get Firefox' as the basis for your string. However, if at all possible, we’d like to signal to the user that they will be going to the App Store and installing the application from there. That is why we are using Get and App in the en-US string.

Message shown after pressing the Erase button
Label displayed for find in page button when typing in the URL Bar. %@ is any text the user has typed into the URL bar that they want to find on the current page.
Text for a menu displayed from the bottom of the screen when a user long presses on the URL bar with clipboard contents.
Placeholder text shown in the URL bar before the user navigates to a page
Label displayed for search button when typing in the URL bar
Text for the URL bar showing the number of trackers blocked on a webpage.
Title for action sheet item to open the current page in another application. Placeholder is the name of the application to open the current page.

trans-unit.target: क्लिपबोर्ड पर यूआरएल की प्रतिलिपि बनाई गई
trans-unit.note: Toast displayed after a URL has been copied to the clipboard
Label to display in the Discoverability overlay for keyboard shortcuts
Text for the context menu when a user wants to copy an image after long pressing it.
Text for the context menu when a user wants to copy a link after long pressing it.
Text for the context menu when a user has a link on their clipboard.
Text for the context menu when a user wants to save an image after long pressing it.
Text for the context menu when a user wants to share a link after long pressing it.
Dialog title used for opening an external app from Focus. First placeholder string is the app name of either Focus or Klar and the second placeholder string specifies the app it wants to open.

trans-unit.source: This lets you save images to your Camera Roll
trans-unit.target: यह आपको अपने कैमरा रोल में चित्रों को सहेजने की अनुमति देता है
trans-unit.note: Description for dialog used for requesting a user to enable access to Photos.
Title for button that takes the user to system settings

trans-unit.source: “%@” Would Like to Access Your Photos
trans-unit.target: “%@” आपकी तस्वीरें एक्सेस करना चाहता है
trans-unit.note: Dialog title used for requesting a user to enable access to Photos. Placeholder is either Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar
Text displayed as an example of the template to add a search engine.
Text for a share button
Text for the share menu when a user wants to copy a URL.

trans-unit.source: Use Touch ID to return to %@
trans-unit.target: %@ पर वापस जाने के लिए टच आईडी का प्रयोग करें
trans-unit.note: %@ is app name. Prompt shown to ask the user to use Touch ID to continue browsing after returning to the app.
Label for ad trackers.
label for analytic trackers.
Text for tracking protection screen showing the connection is not secure
Text for tracking protection screen showing the connection is secure
String to let users know the site verifier, where the placeholder represents the SSL certificate signer.
label for content trackers.
text showing the tracking protection is disabled.
Title for the tracking settings page to change what trackers are blocked.

trans-unit.source: Turning this off may fix some site problems
trans-unit.target: इसे बंद करने से साइट की कुछ समस्याएँ ठीक हो सकती हैं
trans-unit.note: Description/subtitle for the tracking protection label.
Text for the button to learn more about Tracking Protection.
Text for the button that closes the Shield Data and opens the regular Settings screen.
label for social trackers.

trans-unit.source: Protections are OFF for this session
trans-unit.target: इस सत्र के लिए सुरक्षा बंद हैं
trans-unit.note: Text for the status off from Tracking Protection.

trans-unit.source: Protections are ON for this session
trans-unit.target: इस सत्र के लिए सुरक्षा चालू हैं
trans-unit.note: Text for the status on from Tracking Protection.

trans-unit.source: Disable until you close %@ or tap ERASE.
trans-unit.target: आपके %@ बंद करने या ERASE टैप करने तक अक्षम करें.
trans-unit.note: Description for the tracking protection toggle. Placeholder is either Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar
Text for the toggle that enables/disables tracking protection.

trans-unit.source: Keep your data to yourself. %@ protects you from many of the most common trackers that follow what you do online.
trans-unit.note: General description of tracking protection settings, which is displayed underneath the trackers preferences in Settings. Placeholder is either Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar
Text for tracking protection screen showing the number of trackers blocked since the app install. The placeholder is replaced with the install date of the application.
Text for the header of trackers section from Tracking Protection.
The title of the Licenses setting in the settings that Focus shows in the global iOS Settings app.
